a.span: ALL RSU 39 schools are observing Gov. Mills "Stay-Put" mandate and will be closed to all Students and Public until May 1st due to the Corona Virus threat.

span.span: Click HERE for the Distance Learning Resources

div.div: Some elements on this page did not load. Refresh your site & try again.

span.span: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM RSU 39 FOOD SERVICES:

Starting Monday, March 23rd we will begin delivering lunches to any child in Caribou, and Stockholm that is under the age of 18. If you want to have a lunch delivered we have setup a hotline the number is 207-493-4258 and also an email address dedicated to these requests. You can call or email at foodservices@rsu39.org. Whether you choose to call or email, please give us your name, the number of lunches you are requesting, make sure to tell us the address that we will be delivering to, and please provide us with a call back number so if we need to reach you we can. We hope you take advantage of our delivered lunch program as there are no eligibility requirements except the 18 or younger federal requirement.
*ESEA TESTING POLICY, OPT OUT STATEMENT, DATES
